summary.para: Retrieves the enumeration mode of the parsed item.

param.name: pfeMode
param.para: Pointer to a value that, when this method returns successfully, receives one of the values specifying the enumeration mode.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Sets the enumeration mode of the parsed item.

param.name: feMode
param.para: One of the values that specify the enumeration mode.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Exposes methods that get and set enumeration modes of a parsed item.

remarks.para: This interface is implemented as part of a Shell namespace extension, specifically the interface.
This interface is used by the method to retrieve the value which controls the enumeration mode of the parsed item.
Items with different enumeration modes compare canonically different (SHCIDS_CANONICALONLY) because they enumerate different sets of items.
